name: Busy Bee (Aljo San Pedro)
description:
The yellow gumamela is one of a kind, and only grows come spring time. Help Busy Bee push pests away from her yearly flower.

Credits

  • Made by Aljo San Pedro for the DevelUP Mini Game Jam 3
  • Made using Godot Engine
  • Art from Kenney.nl
  • Music from chosic.com
  • Font from fontspace.com
  • Awakening Dew AND Spring Flowers by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon | Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ | Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 | https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
